UFO Sightings

        

Numerous UFO sightings were reported in Southern Ohio on the evening of March 26, 1997. A controversial event involving glowing lights in the night sky was witnessed by thousands across a broad area reaching from Wilmington, Ohio to Maysville, Kentucky.


This section has been created to provided the internet patron the complete details of this event. This section contains interviews, investigation reports, telephone/E-mail contact and advisement regarding the happening.
____________________

    WITNESS TESTIMONY
    regarding the March 26 event, and the nature of the reports

    AN EXPLANATION
    for the event, advanced by a Springfield, Ohio Air National Guard Sergeant.

    CERTAIN PROBLEMS 
    regarding this explanation

    KEY TESTIMONY
    which calls into question the explanation offered by the Springfield A.N.G. Sergeant

    HELICOPTER ACTIVITY
    sighted in the area 2-hours after the event, said by an Ohio Air National Guard major to be a "COORDINATION SHORTFALL."

    MARCH 12th EVENT
    reported from Southern Ohio
